justification: "Conspiracy beliefs are measured using a validated measure of generic conspiracist ideation… The Generic Conspiracist Beliefs Scale (GCB) assesses the extent to which an individual believes that the kind of conspiratorial activity postulated by popular conspiracy theories occurs routinely in the world."
